channel.title: Bioinformatics on Codeless Code
channel.description: Recent content in Bioinformatics on Codeless Code

item.title: Oriented Bounding-Box Heuristic
item.description: A fast O(n) heuristic for finding near-optimal oriented bounding boxes around point sets, using orthogonal linear regression to align rectangles with the natural orientation of the data.

item.title: One-Dimensional Linear Regression
item.description: An interactive demonstration of simple linear regression, showing how the least-squares method finds the best-fitting line through a set of data points by minimizing vertical distances.

item.title: Quadratic Bezier Curves
item.description: An interactive visualization of quadratic BÃ©zier curves, demonstrating how three control points define smooth parametric curves commonly used in computer graphics and design.
